a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Invasive non-typhoidal salmonella incidence rate by age, World
The number of new cases of invasive non-typhoidal salmonella, per 100,000 people in each age group.
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024)
